basics.name: Divyanshu Raj
basics.label: Student, Software Developer, Machine Learning Engineer
basics.summary: Dedicated and versatile Software Development Engineer with a strong foundation in Java and Python, specializing in cloud-native architectures. Experienced in Amazon Web Services (AWS) and Google Cloud Platform (GCP) for scalable solutions. Skilled in microservices, data pipelines, and machine learning. Committed to continuous learning and passionate about creating efficient, innovative software solutions.

work.name: Institute for Advanced Study, Princeton University
work.summary: Teaching at Palmer Physical Laboratory (now 302 Frist Campus Center). While not a professor at Princeton, I associated with the physics professors and continued to give lectures on campus.

awards.title: Nobel Prize in Physics
awards.summary: The Nobel Prizes are five separate prizes that, according to Alfred Nobel's will of 1895, are awarded to 'those who, during the preceding year, have conferred the greatest benefit to humankind.'
